name: ImpairedGlucoseTolerance
title: Impaired Glucose Tolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Codes for conditions associated with impaired glucose tolerance disorders),(Data Element Scope: SNOMED-CT codes that express a condition of "Impaired Glucose Tolerance"),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMED-CT codes that represent a condition of impaired glucose tolerance.),(Exclusion Criteria: SNOMED-CT codes that represent a condition of impaired glucose tolerance that are related to pregnancy.)
